SEARCH
Module com.example.stockgame
Package com.example.stockgame

Class StockMarketGameInterface

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.example.stockgame.StockMarketGameInterface
public class StockMarketGameInterface extends javafx.application.Application
Main class of the stock market game, extending JavaFX Application. It sets up the user interface and initializes the game logic.

    • displayStockTable

      public javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane displayStockTable(List<Stock> stocks)
      Generates a ScrollPane containing a table of stocks, either from all available stocks or the user's portfolio.
      Parameters:
      stocks - The list of stocks to display in the table.
      Returns:
      A ScrollPane containing the stocks table.

    • initializeStockList

      public void initializeStockList()
      Initializes the list of stocks available in the game. This includes generating random stocks of different risk levels.

    • showBuySellStockWindow

      public void showBuySellStockWindow(Stock stock, boolean isPortfolio)
      Opens a new window for buying or selling the selected stock, allowing the user to input the amount of money to spend or receive.
      Parameters:
      stock - The stock being bought or sold.
      isPortfolio - A flag indicating if the stock is from the user's portfolio (true) or the market (false).

    • errorWindow

      public void errorWindow(String error)
      Displays an error window with a specified error message.
      Parameters:
      error - The error message to display.

    • findOwnedStockByName

      public Stock findOwnedStockByName(String stockName)
      Finds a stock owned by the user by its name.
      Parameters:
      stockName - The name of the stock to find.
      Returns:
      The found stock, or null if not found.
